column14: w. va. passed away at her residence june 19
column17: the daughter of the late corley s. and irene miller hunt. donna was a factory worker in glass production. her greatest joy in life was her devotion to her family and her firm belief in god. she is survived by her husband of 47 years
column19: tammy bunner of parkersburg; one son
column20: charles buckalew ii (terra) also of parkersburg; two brothers
column21: john and russ hunt both of parkersburg; and six grandchildren
column24: allie and samantha bunner and elijah and noah buckalew. funeral services will be held at 2:00 p. m.
column31: with pastors steve joy and mike seebaugh officiating. burial will follow the service at sunset memory gardens
column32: parkersburg. visitation will be 2:00 p. m. to 4:00 p. m. and 6:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. sunday at the funeral home. the family requests in lieu of flowers
